      • getAvailable

        public java.util.List<Action> getAvailable(int damage,
                                           boolean frenzy,
                                           boolean beforeFirst)
        returns a list with all the possible actions a player can do in the turn
        Parameters:
        damage - value of the actual damage of the active player
        frenzy - flag for the frenzy mode
        beforeFirst - flag indicating if the player is before or after the first player of the game (in frenzy mode)
        Returns:
        a list of posslbe actions
